name: YASS 2
description:
YASS 2 is a prototype of a 3D space shooter made with Unity. The final objective of the game is to take down the two big ships protected by shields. How? You'll have to find out. The source code is available on GitHub if you're interested!

CONTROLS:

  • WASD to move horizontally and vertically: it's possible to invert the controls from the settings menu
  • Q/E to rotate the ship on the front axis
  • Left Click (hold) to shoot
  • Right Click to shoot missiles. You only have 3 of them, but they deal a lot of damage.
  • Shift to dash
  • ESC to open the pause menu

Any kind of feedback and bug reports are very welcome!

WHERE IS YASS 1?

The original YASS was lost due to me messing up the first GitHub repository, so I had to change the name.
